result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Amy.
Case Called:  8:32 a.m. 
INCLUDES 21CF1150, 21CF1201, 22CF281, 22CF282, 22CF773, 22CF905, 22CF919.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski. 
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ, with Attorney John Wallace. 

Date and time set for bond forfeiture hearing; VRCW. 
COURT questions Atty Wallace re: missed appearance.  Atty Wallace makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS all bonds reinstated.  

COURT sets PTC for 10/12/22 at 2:15 p.m. 

Adj:  8:35 a.m.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:06 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CF905, 22CF1095 & 22CF919.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes Attorney John Wallace has been appointed.
Prelim set for 09/21/2022 @ @ 9:10 am, Branch 6. 

Adj: 1:07 pm.

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  2:21 p.m. 
INCLUDES 21CF1150, 21CF1201, 22CF281, 22CF282, 22CF773, 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, pro se. 

Date and time set for initial appearance on 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919; VRCW.  

**COURT quashes any outstanding warrants**

Atty Cannon states deft did not want to meet with SPD today.  

Initial appearance on 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919>>
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Defendant states he received complaints but has been too impaired to understand them. 
COURT finds probable cause in all new cases.  
COURT adjourns matters for defendant to read and understand recent charges. 

COURT sets IA for 9/12/22 at 2:00 p.m., Branch 5.  

BOND:  $5000.00 cash to include 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with any victims identified in complaint.  
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Prints and photograph. 

Adj:  2:26 p.m.
$30.00 warrant fee. Brought to jail by Wausau PD

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 3:13 pm 
INCLUDES 21CF1150, 21CF1201, 22CF281, 22CF282, 22CF773, 22CF905, & 22CF919. 
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett; Deft does NOT appear. 
Deft missed PTC on 8/24/2022. 
COURT makes findings. 
COURT ORDERS bond forfeited and authorizes $5000 bench warrant in 21CF1150, 21CF1201, 22CF281, & 22CF282. 
COURT continues warrants in 22CF773, 22CF905, & 22CF919. 
BFH: 9/28/2022 at 8:30 am in Br. 4. 
Adj: 3:15 pm
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Review Hearing on September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:29 am.
INCLUDES: 22CF773, 22CF905 & 22CF919.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

State appears by ADA Cody Marschall and ADA Ben Vechinski for ADA Natalie Zibolski. 
Defendant fails to appear.

COURT notes proper notice given in re: today's hearing. 
State requests bench warrant.
COURT ORDERS: BWA $1,000.00 (to cover all cases).

Adjourned: 9:30 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:29 am.
INCLUDES: 22CF773, 22CF905 & 22CF919.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

State appears by ADA Cody Marschall and ADA Ben Vechinski for ADA Natalie Zibolski. 
Defendant fails to appear.
